summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Panel features completed. Backend APIs 100% functional (24/24 tests passed). Frontend UI working correctly with all 4 tabs (Usuarios, Roles, Tipos, MÃ³dulos) displaying data and CRUD operations available.

issues: Notification dropdown can intercept clicks on tabs when open - minor UX issue

seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during tests (TEST_ prefixed items)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Panel fully tested. All CRUD operations for Users, Roles, User Types, and Modules work correctly. Task templates within modules can be added, edited, and deleted. Project creation generates tasks from DB-stored module templates. Stats endpoint returns correct counts.

users_tab.view_users: PASS - Lists all users with name, email, role, type
users_tab.cannot_delete_self: PASS - Admin cannot delete own account

roles_tab.view_roles: PASS - Shows 3 system roles (admin, project_manager, collaborator)
roles_tab.edit_role: PASS - Can edit role name and description
roles_tab.cannot_delete_system_roles: PASS - System roles protected from deletion

user_types_tab.view_user_types: PASS - Shows 8 default user types with colors
user_types_tab.create_user_type: PASS - Can create new user types
user_types_tab.edit_user_type: PASS - Can edit name and color

modules_tab.view_modules: PASS - Shows 8 modules with task counts
modules_tab.expand_module: PASS - Can expand to see task templates
modules_tab.edit_module: PASS - Can edit module name, description, color
modules_tab.add_task_template: PASS - Can add task templates with checklist and deliverables
modules_tab.edit_task_template: PASS - Can edit task template details

project_creation.generates_tasks_from_templates: PASS - Creating project with modules generates tasks from DB templates

admin_stats.stats_endpoint: PASS - Returns counts for users, projects, tasks, modules, user_types, roles
